name: Super Blackjack Battle 2 Turbo Edition - The Card Warriors
description: Follow the invitation by the owner of the largest Casino in Las Vegas and Godfather of the local most influential crime family and face the other participants in a face-off game of cards. Only the best will fly to Vegas to challenge the Godfather himself in a final match!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel i3 or AMD equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Non-Dedicated (shared) video card with at least 512MB Shared VRAM Storage: 1200 MB available space
